page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT IN LITTLEMILL
page.content: The area has become an{employment {black spot}with next to no industrial development moving in to replace the decaying traditional industry.{The {main employment of the area has always {been coal mining but as the mines have {closed,nothing has come in to replace {them.}Most people living in this area who work have to travel in the region of ten miles to find employment.Many of the miners have taken advantage of early retirement schemes to get out of the industry. There is also{limited {public transport}through the area so travelling to seek employment is difficult. Without employment running a car is impossible so the people are caught in a vicious circle.
